postnl_cod_fee.label: Tax class for PostNL COD fee
postnl_cod_fee.tooltip: This tax class will be used when calculating the tax for the PostNL COD fee.

postnl_cod_fee_including_tax.label: PostNL COD fee
postnl_cod_fee_including_tax.tooltip: Whether the PostNL COD fee you have entered is incl. or excl. tax.

active.label: Enabled
active.tooltip: Enable or disable the PostNL Cash on Delivery payment method.

title.label: Title
title.tooltip:
If you have configured a fee in the field below, you may use '%s' in the title. This will be replaced with the fee amount in the customer's chosen currency.

I.e. If the fee is 17.45 EUR and the title you have entered is "PostNL COD (+%s)" then the title will show "PostNL COD (+â‚¬17,45)". If the customer has chosen to pay in USD, the title will show "PostNL COD (+$23.73)" instead.

fee.label: Fee
fee.tooltip: This fee will be charged to the customer when they choose to pay using PostNL COD.

fee_label.label: Fee label
fee_label.tooltip: This label will be displayed next to the fee on the checkout, order, invoice and creditmemo pages and pdfs.

order_status.label: New order status
order_status.tooltip: Newly placed orders will have this status.

instructions.label: Instructions
instructions.comment: This text will be shown to customers when they choose this payment method.
instructions.tooltip: Html tags are allowed in this field.

allow_for_non_postnl.label: Allow for non-PostNL orders
allow_for_non_postnl.tooltip: Set this option to 'yes' to allow orders placed using a different shipping method than PostNL to use this payment method.

allow_for_buspakje.label: Allow for letter box parcels
allow_for_buspakje.comment: This option is only applicable when using letter box parcels and the letter box parcel calculation mode is set to 'automatic'.
allow_for_buspakje.tooltip: Letter box parcels cannot be shipped using COD. If an order is a letter box parcel and the customer chooses to pay using PostNL COD, the order will be shipped as a regular parcel instead.

rate_source.label: Rate Source
rate_source.tooltip: You can use the rates you have entered for Magento's Table Rates shipping method or you can choose to enter table rates specific for the PostNL shipping method.

matrix_import.label: Import Rates
matrix_import.comment: A prefilled csv file can be found here.

import_export_header.label: You can import and export rates on the website scope. You can change your current scope with the dropdown at the top left of this page.

include_virtual_price.label: Include Virtual Products in Price Calculation

general.label: Registration
general.comment: In this first step you will need to register the extension.

activation_in_progress_header.label: Please fill in the fields below to finish the extension registration procedure. Click here to reset the registration procedure.

activated_header.label: The extension has been registered. Click here to be able to register the extension under a different name.

email.label: Email
email.tooltip: During registration 2 secure keys will be sent to this email address.

only_default_header.label: Extension registration is only available on the 'global' scope.

cif_address.label: Address Details
cif_address.comment: Please fill in your address details. These details are required for the activation of the extension.

sender_country_missing_header.label: The sender country setting is only available on the 'global' scope.

country.label: Country
country.tooltip: Please note: the country you select here will be used to determine whether certain shipping options (such as Belgium domestic) are available to you.

use_dutch_address.label: Use a Dutch sender address when sending shipments to Dutch addresses.

use_sender_address.label: Use only the primary sender address

cif_labels_and_confirming.label: Store Settings
cif_labels_and_confirming.comment: The extension can be completely adjusted to fit seamlessly with the processes of your online store. Here you can configure the most crucial settings.

use_dutch_products.label: Activate Dutch products
use_dutch_products.tooltip: If this option is activated then you can use the Dutch PostNL range of products for shipments to the Netherlands

label_size.label: Label size
label_size.tooltip: This setting only applies to multiple Dutch and EU labels. Non-EU labels are always printed as A4.

shipping_duration.label: Shipping duration
shipping_duration.tooltip: The number of days shipping will take after a customer finishes their order.

cutoff_time.label: Order cut-off time
cutoff_time.tooltip: When an order is placed after this time, another day will be added to the shipping duration. Please enter this time in the %s time zone.

saturday_cutoff_time.label: Saturday cut-off time
saturday_cutoff_time.tooltip: When an order is placed after this time, another day will be added to the shipping duration. Please enter this time in the %s time zone.

sunday_cutoff_time.label: Sunday cut-off time
sunday_cutoff_time.tooltip: When an order is placed after this time, another day will be added to the shipping duration. Please enter this time in the %s time zone.

shipping_days.label: Shipping days
shipping_days.comment: Select on which days of the week orders are shipped. You can read more about shipping and delivery days here.

checkout_settings_header.label: Checkout settings (only active in the Netherlands)

postcode_live_info.comment: The address check is only available if the plugin is in live mode.

checkout_extension.label: Checkout extension
checkout_extension.tooltip: Postcode validation and delivery options are only available for supported checkouts.

postcode_nl_extension_conflict_info.comment: You are currently using the Postcode.nl extension. This extension conflicts with the PostNL extension's built-in postcode validator. We recommend you disable the Postcode.nl extension if you wish to use the PostNL extensions' postcode validator.

osc_google_places_conflict.comment: You are currently using the PostNL postcode check in combination with OneStepCheckout's Google Places. Please keep in mind that the PostNL postcode check will overwrite OneStepCheckout's address fields and thereby also the Google Places functionality.

use_postcode_check.label: Use postcode check and agree with the terms
use_postcode_check.tooltip: Automatically complete Dutch addresses after your customer fills in his postcode and house number.

use_postcode_check_non_domestic.label: Pay attention: The postcode check is only active in the Netherlands

postcode_check_in_checkout.label: Use postcode check on checkout page

postcode_check_in_addressbook.label: Use postcode check in customer's address book

postcode_check_timeout.label: Connection timeout duration
postcode_check_timeout.tooltip: After this number of seconds a customer will be prompted to fill in his address manually. Leave this field empty to disable the feature. Please note: if a customer needs to wait too long he might leave the order process.

gomage_postcode_check_info.comment:
If you are using the Gomage Lightcheckout extension in combination with the PostNL Postcode check;
Please know that the street-settings from the Gomage Lightcheckout extension will be ignored.
Read more about the settings here

split_street_unavailable_info.comment: You are currently using fewer than 2 address lines. In order to guarantee proper address processing, the PostNL extension requires at least 2 address lines. You can read more on how to configure split address lines here.

split_street.label: Split street parts
split_street.comment: You can read more on how to configure split address lines here.
split_street.tooltip: If you do not use split street lines and you wish to ship to outside the EU, there is a strong possibility that PostNL will be unable to properly parse the address. This may result in the shipment being refused or it may even lead to the shipment being delivered at the wrong address!

doorcode_field.label: Doorcode field
doorcode_field.tooltip: Doorcodes are often used in foreign addresses such as those used in France and Singapore.

delivery_options.label: Delivery Options NL
delivery_options.comment: Your customers choose when, where and how they would like to receive their orders with PostNL's delivery options. Let your customers pick a day and the extension will show the estimated time of delivery. On Tuesdays and Wednesdays PostNL also delivers in the evening. Maybe your customers prefer to pick up their orders from one of the 2000 Post offices? No problem, a growing number of locations even have the orders ready for pickup early in the morning.

delivery_options_disabled_header.label: PostNL delivery options are only available for Magento's One Page Checkout, Idev's OneStepCheckout and the GoMage LightCheckout extensions.

delivery_options_belgium_header.label: PostNL delivery options are only available when shipping from the Netherlands.

delivery_options_google_places_conflict.comment: You are currently using the PostNL Delivery Options in combination with OneStepCheckout's Google Places. Since both functionalities use the Google Maps api, this could lead to unexpected errors.

osc_delivery_date_delivery_options_confl.comment: You are currenlty using both the delivery date functionality from OneStepCheckout and the PostNL Delivery Options. While these functionalities should work side by side without issues, this could be confusing to your clients.

delivery_options_gomage_conflict_warning.label: [POSTNL-0222] Warning: possible PostNL and GoMage LightCheckout conflict. Click here for more information from the TIG knowledgebase.
delivery_options_gomage_conflict_warning.comment: You have enabled PostNL delivery options and GoMage LightCheckout's Delivery Date functionality for the same shipping methods. Unfortunately these two functionalities conflict. Please disable one of these features.

theme.label: Delivery options theme
theme.comment: You can view an example of the different themes here.

responsive.label: Use responsive design
responsive.tooltip: Select 'yes' to make the delivery options theme responsive. Responsive themes allow users on their mobile phone, tablets and desktops to view the same page in a way that is optimized for their device. Beware: this option may conflict with custom Magento theme.

stock_options.label: Stock options
stock_options.tooltip: Select for which products PostNL delivery options should be available.

enable_delivery_days.label: Enable delivery days
enable_delivery_days.tooltip: Delivery days allow customers to choose on which date they want their order delivered.

delivery_days_number.label: Maximum number of delivery days
delivery_days_number.tooltip: Submit how many days in the future after the first delivery moment your customers can choose to receive their orders.

enable_timeframes.label: Enable timeframes
enable_timeframes.tooltip: Enable timeframes to show the expected delivery times for each delivery day.

enable_evening_timeframes.label: Enable evening delivery
enable_evening_timeframes.tooltip: Activate evening delivery for your customers. Evening delivery is not enabled for every area. The extension will automatically show evening delivery as a delivery option for addresses in enabled areas.

evening_timeframe_fee.label: Evening timeframe fee
evening_timeframe_fee.tooltip: Additional costs for evening timeframes in the store's base currency. This fee will be added to the shipping costs. This value must be between 0.00 and 2.00 EUR incl. VAT. Leave this field empty to charge no extra fee for evening timeframes.

enable_pakjegemak.label: Enable post office locations
enable_pakjegemak.tooltip: Whether or not customers may choose to have their order delivered to a nearby post office.

allow_streetview.label: Allow Google Streetview
allow_streetview.tooltip: If enabled, users may use Google Streetview when choosing a post office location.

enable_id_check_delivery.label: Enable ID check delivery (based on ID-number)
enable_id_check_delivery.comment: With this product person verification is done based on the ID document number.
enable_id_check_delivery.tooltip: Activate ID check delivery, if you have some product(s) were identification or age control is required, it is possible to let the deliverer check the ID at the door.

enable_birthday_check_delivery.label: Enable ID check delivery (based on date of birth)
enable_birthday_check_delivery.comment: With this product person verification is done based on date of birth.
enable_birthday_check_delivery.tooltip: Activate ID check delivery, if you have some product(s) were identification or age control is required, it is possible to let the deliverer check the ID at the door.

enable_age_check_delivery.label: Enable Age check delivery
enable_age_check_delivery.comment: With this product is checked whether a person is older than 18 years.
enable_age_check_delivery.tooltip: Activate ID check delivery, if you have some product(s) were identification or age control is required, it is possible to let the deliverer check the ID at the door.

show_options_for_buspakje.label: Show PostNL delivery options for letter box parcel orders
show_options_for_buspakje.tooltip: By default delivery options are not shown for shipments sent as a letterbox parcel. If you choose to show delivery options nonetheless, you might be forced to process an order as a regular package even though the package complies with the weight and size of a letterbox parcel.

show_all_options_for_buspakje.label: Show all delivery options for letter box parcel orders
show_all_options_for_buspakje.tooltip: If set to 'yes' the same delivery options will be shown for letter box parcel orders as for regular orders. Please note that if the customer chooses a delivery option, the order may no longer be shipped as a letter box parcel.

enable_delivery_days_for_buspakje.label: Show delivery days for letter box parcel orders.

enable_pakjegemak_for_buspakje.label: Show post office locations for letter box parcels.
enable_pakjegemak_for_buspakje.tooltip: If the customer chooses to have an order delivered to a post office location the order may no longer be shipped as a letter box parcel.

enable_pakketautomaat_for_buspakje.label: Show parcel dispenser locations for letter box parcels
enable_pakketautomaat_for_buspakje.tooltip: If the customer chooses to have an order delivered to a parcel dispenser the order may no longer be shipped as a letter box parcel.

stated_address_only_option.label: Show 'only send to stated address' option
stated_address_only_option.tooltip: Enable this option to show a checkbox on the checkout page with which the customer can choose to only send the shipment to the stated address.

stated_address_only_checked.label: Stated address only option checked by default

premium_delivery_options_header.label: Delivery options based on contractual agreements

premium_delivery_options_info.comment: Please note: these delivery options require specific contractual agreements with PostNL. Please contact your PostNL account manager if you wish to use monday, sunday or same day delivery.

allow_sunday_sorting.label: Enable monday delivery
allow_sunday_sorting.comment: You can read more about monday delivery here.
allow_sunday_sorting.tooltip: Activate monday delivery (also known as sunday sorting) for your customers. Note: this only applies to home deliveries. Postal office deliveries will not take place on Monday.

enable_sunday_delivery.label: Enable sunday delivery
enable_sunday_delivery.comment: You can read more about sunday delivery here.
enable_sunday_delivery.tooltip: Activate sunday delivery for your customers.

sunday_delivery_fee.label: Sunday delivery fee
sunday_delivery_fee.tooltip: Additional costs for sunday delivery in the store's base currency. This fee will be added to the shipping costs. Leave this field empty to charge no extra fee for sunday delivery.

enable_sameday_delivery.label: Enable same day delivery
enable_sameday_delivery.comment: Same day delivery will only work if your shipping duration is set to 0 days in either the config or for applicaple products.
enable_sameday_delivery.tooltip: Activate same day delivery for your customers.

sameday_delivery_fee.label: Same day delivery fee
sameday_delivery_fee.tooltip: Additional costs for same day delivery in the store's base currency. This fee will be added to the shipping costs. Leave this field empty to charge no extra fee for same day delivery.

sameday_delivery_cutoff_time.label: Same day delivery cut-off time
sameday_delivery_cutoff_time.tooltip: Same day delivery will only be available when starting an order before this time. Please enter this time in the %s time zone.

enable_food_delivery.label: Enable food delivery
enable_food_delivery.comment: Food Delivery can be used to ship both Dry & Groceries and Cool Products. Please consult your PostNL account manager for more information about activating this service for your account.
enable_food_delivery.tooltip: Activate food delivery for your customers.

enable_extra_at_home.label: Enable Extra@Home
enable_extra_at_home.comment: Extra@Home can be used to ship large and heavy Products. Please consult your PostNL account manager for more information about activating this service for your account.

use_buspakje.label: Use letter box parcels
use_buspakje.tooltip:
If you disable this field all shipments will be considered regular package shipments.
It is very important that you have correctly configured all products when using letter box parcels. Orders weighing more than 2kg or are larger than 38 x 26.5 x 3.2 cm cannot be shipped as letter box parcels.

buspakje_calculation_mode.label: Calculation mode
buspakje_calculation_mode.comment: You can read more about the way the extension calculates whether or not an order is a letter box parcel here.
buspakje_calculation_mode.tooltip: You can let the PostNL extension calculate automatically whether a shipment would fit in a mail slot or you can manually determine this when creating shipments in the backend. If set to 'automatic' the PostNL extension will check the 'Weight' and 'PostNL Max Qty For Letter Box Parcels' of all products in an order to determine whether the shipment would fit through a mail slot. You may always overrule this and manually set whether a shipment is a letter box parcel or not.

delivery_options_int.label: Delivery Options INT
delivery_options_int.comment: Your customers choose when, where and how they would like to receive their orders with PostNL's delivery options. Let your customers pick a day and the extension will show the estimated time of delivery. On Tuesdays and Wednesdays PostNL also delivers in the evening. Maybe your customers prefer to pick up their orders from one of the 2000 Post offices? No problem, a growing number of locations even have the orders ready for pickup early in the morning.

delivery_options_be_active.label: Enable PostNL delivery options in Belgium

enable_delivery_days_be.label: Enable delivery days for Belgium
enable_delivery_days_be.tooltip: Delivery days allow customers to choose on which date they want their order delivered.

delivery_days_number_be.label: Maximum number of delivery days for Belgium
delivery_days_number_be.tooltip: Submit how many days in the future after the first delivery moment your customers can choose to receive their orders.

premium_delivery_options_int_header.label: Delivery options based on contractual agreements

premium_delivery_options_int_info.comment: Please note: these delivery options require specific contractual agreements with PostNL. Please contact your PostNL account manager if you wish to use these options for Belgium.

enable_pakjegemak_be.label: Enable post office locations for Belgium
enable_pakjegemak_be.tooltip: Whether or not customers may choose to have their order delivered to a nearby post office.

allow_sunday_sorting_be.label: Enable monday delivery for Belgium
allow_sunday_sorting_be.comment: You can read more about monday delivery here.
allow_sunday_sorting_be.tooltip: Activate monday delivery (also known as sunday sorting) for your customers. Note: this only applies to home deliveries. Postal office deliveries will not take place on Monday.

cif.label: Account Settings
cif.comment:
Here you can configure your PostNL account.

In order to use this extension you need to register yourself with PostNL. You will then receive all necessary information in order to configure the extension. If you cannot find the email containing this information, please contact your PostNL account manager.

If you want to test the extension, but don't have any test mode credentials you can use the account credentials found here.

customer_number.label: Live Customer Number
customer_number.tooltip: If you are a contract customer of PostNL, you will have received an email containing this setting. If you cannot find this email, please contact PostNL support at 088-2255651.

test_customer_number.label: Test Customer Number
test_customer_number.tooltip: The test customer number of PostNL. This should default to '31337'.

customer_code.label: Live Customer Code
customer_code.tooltip: Your customer code as supplied by PostNL. Must contain between 3 and 4 letters. If you are a contract customer of PostNL, you will have received an email containing this setting. If you cannot find this email, please contact PostNL support at 088-2255651.

test_customer_code.label: Test Customer Code
test_customer_code.tooltip: The test customer code of PostNL. Must contain between 3 and 4 letters. This should default to 'TOTA'.

live_apikey.label: Live Apikey
live_apikey.tooltip: If you are a contract customer of PostNL, you will have received an email containing this setting. If you cannot find this email, please contact PostNL support at 088-2255651

collection_location.label: BLS (location) Code
collection_location.tooltip: The internal code of the nearest PostNL sorting centre. Must contain 6 numbers. If you are a contract customer of PostNL, you will have received an email containing this setting. If you cannot find this email, please contact PostNL support at 088-2255651

dutch_customer_number.label: Customer Number used for shipments to the Netherlands

dutch_customer_code.label: Customer Code for shipments to the Netherlands

validate_button.tooltip:
You can use this button to validate your account settings without saving the configuration. This will send a 'test' request to PostNL. If the above fields are not entered correctly, this will result in an error. Please note that the PostNL extension must be active for the validation to succeed.
Please note that the webshop ID and public webshop ID fields will not be validated. Only your CIF credentials will be checked.

only_global_and_website_header.label: These settings are only available on the 'global' and 'website' scopes.

packing_slip.label: Label, Packing Slip and Weight Settings
packing_slip.comment: Here you decide which information you would like to show on shipping labels and packing slips. The weight unit and the maximum weight of a package are also configured from here.

shipment_reference_type.label: Shipment reference type
shipment_reference_type.tooltip: Select what to use as a shipment's reference. This will be printed on the shipping label

custom_shipment_reference.label: Custom reference value
custom_shipment_reference.tooltip: You can use this field to for example, add a prefix to the shipment increment ID or to help identify the shipment as coming from your webshop. You can use the following variables: {{var shipment_increment_id}}, {{var order_increment_id}} and {{var store_frontend_name}}. The resulting text may not exceed 28 characters.

show_label.label: Show shipping label
show_label.tooltip: If you select 'on the same page' in some cases the shipping label may not fit. In this case, the shipping label will be printed on a separate page instead.

logo.label: Logo for packing slips
logo.tooltip: The image will automatically be resized to fit the maximum dimensions of 900x100px.

show_webshop_info.label: Show webshop information
show_webshop_info.tooltip: If enabled, the shop's name, contact address, CoC and VAT numbers will be displayed on the packing slip.

show_customer_number.label: Show customer number
show_customer_number.tooltip: If enabled, the customer ID will be printed on the packing slip for registered customers.

show_order_info.label: Show order information
show_order_info.tooltip: If enabled, the order ID, shipment ID and order date will be shown on the packing slip.

item_columns.label: Item columns
item_columns.tooltip: You can specify which item columns you would like to show on your packing slip pdf. We recommend you experiment with these settings before using them in a production environment. It may be diffcult to predict the outcome of these settings without trying them out by printing a PostNL packing slip.

comment_type.label: Comment type
comment_type.tooltip: You can choose to show a static, pre-configured message or you can show the last visible comment added to the shipment on the shipment detail page.

weight_per_parcel.label: Maximum weight per parcel
weight_per_parcel.tooltip: Determine the maximum weight per parcel. If an order is too heavy it will be automatically divided into several parcels. You will need to print a separate label for each parcel. This feature is only available for domestic shipments.

weight_unit.label: Weight unit
weight_unit.tooltip: Select the unit in which you've entered products' weight

track_and_trace.label: Track & Trace
track_and_trace.comment: You can choose to send a Track & Trace email automatically after an order is confirmed. From this menu you can also define how you would like to send Track & Trace emails.

send_track_and_trace_email.label: Automatically send track & trace email to customer
send_track_and_trace_email.tooltip: If enabled, a track & trace email will be sent to the customer roughly 20 minutes after a shipment has been confirmed.

track_and_trace_email_template.label: Track & trace email template
track_and_trace_email_template.tooltip: You can customize the track & trace email in system > transactional emails.

send_copy.label: Send a copy of the track & trace email
send_copy.tooltip: If enabled, you may enter separate email addresses to which the track & trace email will be sent in addition to the customer.

copy_to.label: Send track & trace email copy to
copy_to.tooltip: You can enter multiple email addresses separated by commas.

return_customer_code.label: Return customer code
return_customer_code.tooltip: To offer returns to your customer you will need to use a different customer code. Ask you accountmanager to retrieve yours.

print_return_and_shipping_label.label: Print the return label along with regular shipping labels
print_return_and_shipping_label.tooltip: Activate this option to ship the order and returnlabel together.

customer_print_label.label: Allow customers to print the return label from the webshop
customer_print_label.tooltip: This will add a button to the customer's account to print the return label for this shipment.

guest_print_label.label: Allow guests to print the return labels
guest_print_label.tooltip: This will add a button to the sales/guest/shipment page so that guests can print a return label for this shipment.

return_label_instructions_block.label: Return labels instructions block
return_label_instructions_block.tooltip: Please select a static block that contains instructions for customers on how to use the return labels.

email_template.label: Return label email template
email_template.tooltip: You can send the customer an email with the return label attached as a pdf. Please select which transactional email template you would like to use for this email.

return_freepost_number.label: Freepost number
return_freepost_number.comment: You can apply for a freepost number on this page.
return_freepost_number.tooltip: A freepost number is a requisite for using return labels.

only_global_header.label: These settings are only available on the 'global' scope.

print_return_and_shipping_label_be.label: Print the return label along with regular shipping labels
print_return_and_shipping_label_be.tooltip: Activate this option to ship the order and returnlabel together.

customer_print_label_be.label: Allow customers to print the return label from the webshop
customer_print_label_be.tooltip: This will add a button to the customer's account to print the return label for this shipment.

guest_print_label_be.label: Allow guests to print the return labels
guest_print_label_be.tooltip: This will add a button to the sales/guest/shipment page so that guests can print a return label for this shipment.

return_label_instructions_block_be.label: Return labels instructions block
return_label_instructions_block_be.tooltip: Please select a static block that contains instructions for customers on how to use the return labels.

email_template_be.label: Return label email template
email_template_be.tooltip: You can send the customer an email with the return label attached as a pdf. Please select which transactional email template you would like to use for this email.

return_freepost_number_be.label: Freepost number
return_freepost_number_be.comment: You can apply for a freepost number on this page.
return_freepost_number_be.tooltip: A freepost number is a requisite for using return labels.

only_global_header_be.label: These settings are only available on the 'global' scope.

cod.label: PostNL COD
cod.comment:
Activate an extra payment method with COD shipments.
Please note: In order to offer COD shipments to your customers you will need to complete the fields below and activate an extra payment method here.
PostNL COD is only available for Dutch orders.

auto_invoice.label: Automatically create an invoice
auto_invoice.tooltip: If enabled, this will allow the PostNL COD payment method to automatically create an invoice once a shipment has been delivered.

default_cod_product_option.label: Default COD shipping option
default_cod_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to domestic COD shipments.

default_evening_cod_product_option.label: Default evening COD delivery shipping option
default_evening_cod_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to domestic evening delivery shipments.

default_pakjegemak_cod_product_option.label: Default 'deliver at the Post Office' COD option
default_pakjegemak_cod_product_option.tooltip: This setting can be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to Post Office COD shipments.

cif_peps_settings.label: Priority EPS parcels
cif_peps_settings.comment: Please note: Some of the priority parcel products require specific contractual agreements with PostNL. Please contact your PostNL account manager for more information about these products.

use_peps.label: Use PEPS Products
use_peps.tooltip: This allows you the use of the priority parcel products. After you enable this setting the products can be selected in the default EPS and Globalpack selection.
use_peps.comment: Packet Tracked is a small parcel with Track & Trace. Hand over your Packet Tracked items in a domestic mailbag with a Packet Tracked baglabel attached. Each of these parcels should have a maximum weight of 2kg.

peps_barcode_type.label: PEPS Barcode Type
peps_barcode_type.tooltip: The current PEPS barcode type as supplied by PostNL. Must contain 2 letters.

cif_globalpack_settings.label: Worldwide Shipping
cif_globalpack_settings.comment: Are you planning to ship outside of the EU? Activate Non-EU with the details you have received from PostNL. You can ignore the Non-EU settings for domestic shipping and shipping within the EU.

use_globalpack.label: Use Non-EU
use_globalpack.tooltip: Non-EU is used to ship orders outside the EU. Otherwise you can leave this field disabled.

global_barcode_type.label: Global Barcode Type
global_barcode_type.tooltip: The current global barcode type as supplied by PostNL. Must contain 2 letters.

global_barcode_range.label: Global Barcode Range
global_barcode_range.tooltip: Your global barcode range as supplied by PostNL. Must contain 4 digits.

customs_license_number.label: Customs license number
customs_license_number.tooltip: If you do not own a customs license, leave this field empty.

customs_certificate_number.label: Customs certificate number
customs_certificate_number.tooltip: If you do not own a customs certificate, leave this field empty.

default_shipment_type.label: Default shipment type
default_shipment_type.tooltip: Please select the default Non-EU shipment type. You can also specify this manually when creating Non-EU shipments.

use_hs_tariff.label: Use HS Tariff
use_hs_tariff.tooltip: The HS tariff value is a number used for export in high volumes to identify the type of product that is shipped. Deactivate this function to leave the value on '000000' or contact PostNL for more information.

hs_tariff_attribute.label: HS Tariff attribute
hs_tariff_attribute.tooltip: We recommend you make the chosen attribute mandatory. However, should the attribute you selected be empty for a certain product, the label will note '000000' instead.

product_sorting_attribute.label: Product sorting attribute
product_sorting_attribute.tooltip: Global shipping labels contain a maximum of 5 products. The sorting method will determine which 5 products are shown. Please note: the remaining products will not be shown on the label.

parcelware_export.label: Parcelware Settings
parcelware_export.comment: This is where you can configure your Parcelware export. You can find more information about configuring these settings here.

parcelware_export_disabled_header.label: Parcelware export is disabled. Activate Parcelware export in order to edit these settings. Please note that you can only activate Parcelware export from the global level.

auto_confirm.label: Automatically confirm exported shipments
auto_confirm.tooltip: This setting will not actually confirm your shipments, it will only give shipments the confirmed status in Magento. This prevents you from accidentally confirming a shipment multiple times in Magento and ParcelWare.

grid.label: User Settings
grid.comment: From this menu you can add columns containing PostNL specific information to the orders and shipments grid. Here you can also define default values for actions.

show_grid_options.label: Show product options in order grid
show_grid_options.tooltip: Activate to show a drop down menu in the order grid containing the product options alongside the bulk action drop down menu. Deactivate to use the default values.

show_buspakje_option.label: Show letter box parcel option in order grid
show_buspakje_option.tooltip: This will add the option to mark shipments as being letter box parcels when creating shipments from the order grid.

order_grid_columns.label: Optional order grid columns
order_grid_columns.tooltip: Selecting too many columns may cause the order grid to no longer fit on your monitor.

order_grid_massaction_default.label: Select a default option for the order grid mass action.

shipping_grid_columns.label: Optional shipment grid columns
shipping_grid_columns.tooltip: Selecting too many columns may cause the shipment grid to no longer fit on your monitor.

shipping_grid_massaction_default.label: Select a default option for the shipment grid mass action.

supported_product_options.label: Select selectable option
supported_product_options.tooltip: If you are unsure which options to select, ask your PostNL account manager.

default_product_option.label: Default shipping option
default_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to domestic shipments.

default_product_option_netherlands.label: Default shipping option for the Netherlands
default_product_option_netherlands.tooltip: This option is only for shipments from Belgium to the Netherlands and may be overwritten.

use_alternative_default.label: Use an alternative default option
use_alternative_default.tooltip: Enable this to use an alternative default option when a shipment's total value exceeds a certain amount.

alternative_default_max_amount.label: Maximum amount
alternative_default_max_amount.tooltip: The alternative default option will be used when the shipment's total amount exceeds this value.

alternative_default_option.label: Alternative default shipping option
alternative_default_option.tooltip: This option will be used as default when the shipment's total value exceeds the given amount.

default_evening_product_option.label: Default evening delivery shipping option
default_evening_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to domestic evening delivery shipments.

default_sunday_product_option.label: Default sunday delivery shipping option
default_sunday_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_id_check_delivery_product_option.label: Default ID check delivery shipping option
default_id_check_delivery_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_id_check_pickup_product_option.label: Default ID check pickup option
default_id_check_pickup_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_age_check_delivery_product_optio.label: Default Age check delivery shipping option
default_age_check_delivery_product_optio.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_age_check_pickup_product_option.label: Default Age check pickup option
default_age_check_pickup_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_birthday_check_delivery_product_.label: Default Birthday check delivery shipping option
default_birthday_check_delivery_product_.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_birthday_check_pickup_product_op.label: Default Birthday check pickup option
default_birthday_check_pickup_product_op.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_extra_at_home_product_option.label: Default Extra@Home shipping option
default_extra_at_home_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_sameday_product_option.label: Default same day delivery shipping option
default_sameday_product_option.tooltip: This setting may be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_pakjegemak_product_option.label: Default 'deliver at the Post Office' option
default_pakjegemak_product_option.tooltip: This setting can be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to Post Office shipments.

default_pakjegemak_nl_be_product_option.label: Default 'deliver at the Post Office' option for Belgium
default_pakjegemak_nl_be_product_option.tooltip: This setting can be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to Post Office shipments from the Netherlands to Belgium.

default_buspakje_product_option.label: Default letter box parcel option
default_buspakje_product_option.tooltip: This setting can be overwritten by manually creating shipments. This option is only applicable to letter box parcel shipments.

default_be_product_option.label: Default BE option
default_be_product_option.tooltip: This setting can be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_eu_product_option.label: Default EU option
default_eu_product_option.tooltip: This setting can be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

default_global_product_option.label: Default Non-EU option
default_global_product_option.tooltip: This setting can be overwritten by manually creating shipments.

free_shipping_fee.label: Extra fee's included in free shipping rules
free_shipping_fee.tooltip: This setting states if fee's should be included or excluded in free shipping rules. If this setting is turned on extra fee's like evening delivery fee's will also be free.

food_delivery_default_product_type.label: Default product type
food_delivery_default_product_type.comment: This value is used to determine the product type of newly created products.
food_delivery_default_product_type.tooltip: This will only be used to change the default product type for new products. Existing products should still be changed manually to the desired value.

default_stated_address_only_product_opti.label: Default 'stated address only' option
default_stated_address_only_product_opti.tooltip: This option will be used as default when the customer has checked the 'stated address only' checkbox during checkout.

advanced.label: Technical Settings
advanced.comment: These settings are intended for advanced users only! If you're not 100% sure what you're doing, please do not touch these settings.

debug_mode.label: Debug mode
debug_mode.tooltip: If enabled, debug logs will be created in the var/logs/TIG_PostNL/ directory. Full logging will log various debugging messages as well as errors. N.B.: these log files may become very large in a short amount of time.

pdf_font_compatibility_mode.label: PDF font compatibility mode
pdf_font_compatibility_mode.comment: Only use this if you have problems with special characters on your PostNL packing slip.
pdf_font_compatibility_mode.tooltip: This makes the PostNL packing slip use the standard Magento packing slip font. While this is visually less appealing, it can resolve some issues with special characters.

imagick_label.label: PDF (Combi-label) Imagick
imagick_label.comment: Only use this if you have problems printing combi-labels in batch.
imagick_label.tooltip: This function makes sure when printing multiple combi-label orders with packingslip, all the labels are printed. Before using this function, please make sure your server has the Imagick PHP extension.

infinite_label_printing.label: Allow infinite label printing
infinite_label_printing.tooltip: By default a maximum of 200 labels can be printed at once. Enable this to remove this limitation. Beware: enabling this may lead to server instability.

max_parcel_count.label: Maximum number of parcels per shipment
max_parcel_count.tooltip:
Leave empty to allow an infinite amount of parcels per shipment.
If this value is empty or exceeds 200, you need to set 'Allow infinite label printing' to yes in order to be able to print the shipment's labels.

max_temp_file_storage_time.label: Maximum temporary file storage time
max_temp_file_storage_time.tooltip: In seconds. After this time, temporary files will be deleted. Only increase this if you use custom functionality to create a very large amount of labels at once.

send_statistics.label: Send extension usage statistics to PostNL
send_statistics.tooltip: In order to continuously improve the PostNL extension, the extension sends usage statistics to a secure PostNL server.

receive_updates.label: Receive notifications from PostNL regarding updates and promotions
receive_updates.tooltip: PostNL may periodically send important updates regarding new versions of the PostNL extension or important security updates in the same manner as Magento. Disable this setting to no longer ecieve these notifications.

show_error_details_in_frontend.label: Show error details in the frontend
show_error_details_in_frontend.tooltip: If set to 'yes', error details will be shown in the frontend when an error occurs. Error details include the error code as well as a link to the TIG knowledgebase article concerning the error. This is useful for debugging purposes, but should be disabled in a production environment.

postnl_shipping_methods.label: PostNL shipping methods
postnl_shipping_methods.tooltip: Please select the shipping methods that will be considered to be 'PostNL' by this extension. Orders placed using one of these shipping methods may be processed using the PostNL extension.

cif_versions_infobox.label: ONLY CHANGE THESE SETTINGS WITH DIRECT INSTRUCTION FROM POSTNL OR TIG

uninstall_button.comment: Click here for more information about the uninstall process.
